8. Our seafood dishes will take your taste buds on a journey to the coast of Italy! Come to Villa Gennaro at 75 Lincoln Highway, Edison, NJ 08820 or call (732) 549-8554 to place your order. 🦐🦑 #VillaGennaro #ItalianFood #BYOB
9. Savor the succulent and tender flavors of our Veal Saltimbocca, topped with prosciutto and melted mozzarella. Visit Villa Gennaro at 75 Lincoln Highway, Edison, NJ 08820 or call (732) 549-8554 to place your order. 🍝🍷 #VillaGennaro #ItalianFood #BYOB
10. Treat yourself to our creamy and zesty Penne a la Vodka, made with a splash of vodka and a touch of cream. Visit us at 75 Lincoln Highway, Edison, NJ 08820 or call (732) 549-8554 to place your order. 🍝🍷 #VillaGennaro #ItalianFood #BYOB
11. Experience the rich and earthy flavors of our Portobello Mushroom Ravioli, stuffed with tender mushrooms and topped with sun-dried tomatoes and asparagus in a creamy garlic sauce. Visit Villa Gennaro at 75 Lincoln Highway, Edison, NJ 08820 or call
